heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers south and in the St. Lawrence Valley, numerous elsewhere north, with a trace to an inch in the valleys, and 1 to 3 inches over high terrain. Temperatures in the upper 20s to lower 30s north, and low to mid 30s in the south; wind chills in the teens and 20s. West winds 10 to 15 mph, and gusting to 30 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Variable clouds. Snow showers scattered early in the  north, and in the southern Greens, then diminishing; another trace to an inch mainly over high terrain. Lows from the mid 20s to around 30, with some lower 20s northeast and in the Adirondacks. West winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting to 30 mph early.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers, except slight chance of sprinkles or flurries in southeastern valleys. Highs in the low to mid 30s, except upper 30s to lower 40s in southeastern valleys, and in the Hudson Valley. Southwest winds 5 to 15 mph.
